content:
https://iqss.github.io/ondemand-loop/ is a new MKDocs site built from the "docs" folder at https://github.com/IQSS/ondemand-loop

The Admin Guide was added in https://github.com/IQSS/ondemand-loop/pull/260 for example.

I heard in a podcast recently that lots of Python projects are switching to MKDocs. I just thought I'd kick off a discussion about it. :smile:
Ketzer! :ogre: :stuck_out_tongue_wink:
There is a Maven Plugin for mkdocs... https://codeberg.org/shred/mkdocs-maven-plugin ducks and runs
